mapper.update: update memberstore set storeCode=#{storeCode}, storeName=#{storeName}, addr=#{addr}, defaultfile=#{defaultfile} where id=#{id}
update starHistory set useStar=#{useStar}, totalStar=#{totalStar}, state=#{state}, storeName=#{storeName}, totalPrice=#{totalPrice}, saveDate=sysdate, validDate=sysdate+365 where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select s.storeCode, s.storeName, s.addr, f.defaultfile from store S join storefile F ON S.storecode = F.storecode where s.storeCode = #{storeCode}
mapper.update: update starHistory set cardNum = #{card.cardNum} where id=(select id from member where num=#{member.num})

update membercard set menuCode=#{card.menuCode}, cardnum=#{card.cardNum}, korName=#{card.korName}, menuimage=#{card.menuImage}, balance=#{card.totalPrice}, memberNum=#{member.num} where id =#{member.id}
mapper.select: select menuCode, korName, menuImage from menu where menuCode = #{menuCode}
select storeName, addr, storecode from store where storeName =#{storeName}
select S.useStar, S.id, M.nickName, M.grade, C.menuimage, C.balance, C.korname from starHistory S join member M on S.id = M.id full join membercard C on S.id = C.id where M.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update member set phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, nickname=#{nickName} where id=#{id}
update member set pw=#{pw} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select rownum R, N.* from (select * from memberStore where id= #{id})N
mapper.insert: insert into membercard values (card_seq.nextval, #{id}, null, null, null, null, null, null, #{num})
insert into starhistory values (star_seq.nextval, #{id}, null, 0, 0, 0, null, null, 0, sysdate, sysdate)
